Class ModelAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_hildesheim.sse.qmApp.ModelAccess

  • public class ModelAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides generic access to EASy models.
    Author:
    Holger Eichelberger

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initialize by setting the model-location. Therefore take the model-location from the properties-file and add this location to the VarModel.

      • getConfiguration

        public static de.uni_hildesheim.sse.model.confModel.Configuration getConfiguration(java.lang.String modelName)
        Returns the configuration of the variability model with name modelName. For now, this method does not consider any version.
        Parameters:
        modelName - the name of the model
        Returns:
        the configuration of modelName or if it does not exist, an empty configuration

      • obtainVariable

        public static de.uni_hildesheim.sse.model.confModel.IDecisionVariable obtainVariable(java.lang.String modelName,
                                                                     java.lang.String varName)
        Obtains a (configured) decision variable.
        Parameters:
        modelName - the name of the model/configuration to access
        varName - the variable name
        Returns:
        the queried decision variable (may be null if not found)

      • store

        public static void store(de.uni_hildesheim.sse.model.confModel.Configuration config,
         java.io.Writer writer)
        Stores the given configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to be written
        writer - the (output) writer to store the configuration
